title: task 'rustc' failed at 'failure in fork: Cannot allocate memory', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/snap3-linux/build/src/libnative/io/process.rs:495
body:
When trying to compile version a692e9b1234ff6573b0cfbc39394d9222eb38f81 of rust i get the following error after `make`:

cfg: build triple i686-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: host triples i686-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: target triples i686-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: enabling more debugging (CFG_ENABLE_DEBUG)
cfg: host for i686-unknown-linux-gnu is i386
cfg: os for i686-unknown-linux-gnu is unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: using gcc
cfg: no pdflatex found, deferring to xelatex
cfg: no xelatex found, deferring to lualatex
cfg: no lualatex found, disabling LaTeX docs
cfg: no pandoc found, omitting PDF and EPUB docs
cfg: no llnextgen found, omitting grammar-verification
oxidize: i686-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/lib/rustlib/i686-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' failed at 'failure in fork: Cannot allocate memory', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/snap3-linux/build/src/libnative/io/process.rs:495

make: **\* [i686-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/lib/rustlib/i686-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/stamp.rustc] Fehler 101

My system does not have very much memory. `free -m` reports a total of 1627.
